maintain a high frame rate if the frame rate drops
due to a high processing load.

When turned OFF, the frame rate may be low in
situations where the processing load is high."

"高負荷になったときに解像度を縮小して
高フレームレートを保つ機能です。

ＯＦＦにすると戦闘中などで
低フレームレートになることが予想されます。"

"Set how many player characters to
display in full detail, such as showing equipment.
Lowering the count will improve performance."

"Set how many Photon Blasts to display.
Displaying fewer will ease processing."

"Set the quality of water reflection.
Lowing the value will improve performance slightly."

"Set the quality of shadow rendering.
Lowing the value will improve performance slightly."

"画面の明るさを設定します。
数値を下げると画面全体の明るさを
おさえることができます。"

"Set the screen's brightness.
Lowering the value will reduce the brightness of the entire screen."

"Set the Mouse rotation speed.
Lowering the value will reduce the speed of the camera rotation speed when using the Mouse."

"Set the option to display other player's accessories.

By setting to \"Blacklist Only\", only players in your blacklist will have their accessories hidden.

\"Hide for All\" will disable all accessories from other players regardless of whether they're on your blacklist or not.

Disabling this option sets the default behavior of showing all accessories defined by other players."
"Sets whether you wish to display \"Add to Wish List\" or \"Add to Gift List\" in the item menu."
"You can select whether or not to automatically send items to Material Storage box."

"Improves the quality of
reflections on some terrain.

Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Sets the quality of
distortions on effects.

Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Sets the resolution of 3D effects.

Lowering this setting will improve performance slightly."

"Reduces the effects of particles.

Selecting \"Reduce\", it will improve performance slightly."

"Improves the quality of fur on some characters.

Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Suppresses noise in glossy
expressions to improve quality.

Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Limit the frame rate and lighten processing load
when PSO2 is not focused."

"Improve the terrain quality by realistically drawing certain effects.

Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Suppresses screen tearing.

If the frame rate is set lower
than your display's refresh rate,
this will automatically be disabled."

"Improves the smoothness of textures.

Game performance can change depending on this setting.
Bilinear will improve performance slightly.

※Changes will take effect at next login."

"Sets the texture resolution.

Lowering the setting will improve performance slightly.

※Changes will take effect at next login."

"Body types in NGS & PSO2 are automatically synchronized,
but if you want to edit them individually, please select
\"Edit Body Types Individually\". (Only available within the Salon)"
